C

Candy - Interface in model
Interface for collectable objects in the labyrinth.
CandyFactory - Class in model
Factory of Candy.
CandyFactory() - Constructor for class model.CandyFactory
 
CELL - Static variable in class view.View
 
changed(int, int) - Method in interface model.AbstractCharacter.OnChangeListener
 
Cherry - Class in model
Cherry implement the interface Candy and has a type equals to 10.
Cherry(int, int) - Constructor for class model.Cherry
Create an instance of PinkCandy with specific coordinates.
clean() - Method in class view.View
Clean all content on the stage.
clearGraph(Graph) - Static method in class model.Graph
Remove all vertices and edges of the graph.
closeDoorRandom() - Method in class model.Graph
Close randomly a door from the graph.
collision(Vertex) - Method in class model.PlayableCharacter
Retrieves a boolean corresponding if the player is colliding with another object.
controller - package controller
 
Controller - Class in controller
Link between views and models.
copy(Object) - Method in class model.Vertex
Copy a Vertex into the current Vertex.
correctCandyPosition(AbstractCandy[], AbstractCandy, Vertex) - Static method in class model.AbstractCandy
Check if the position of the Candy we want to put is not already used by another Candy, or the player or the exit door.
correctSwitchPosition(ArrayList<Door>, AbstractCandy[], Vertex, Vertex) - Static method in class model.Door
Check if the position of the actual switch we want to put is not already used by another Switch or Candy or the exit door or the player himself.
createCandy(int, int, String) - Method in class view.View
Create and add to the panel the sprite of a candy, which is different according to imgPath.
createDoor(int, int) - Method in class view.View
Create and add the exit door in the panel.
createEnnemies(int, int) - Method in class view.View
Create and add to the panel the sprite of an enemy in the labyrinth.
createPlayable() - Method in class view.View
Create a playable character.
createSwitchOff(int, int) - Method in class view.View
Create and add the sprite of an on-off switch (off) on the panel.
createSwitchOn(int, int) - Method in class view.View
Create and add the sprite of an on-off switch (on) on the panel.
